dblp.social.loader
Class PartFilesPool

java.lang.Object
  dblp.social.loader.PartFilesPool

public class PartFilesPool
extends java.lang.Object

This class defines a pool of PartFiles object.

staffiero

Method Detail

initialize

public static void initialize(java.lang.String descriptorFilePath)
                       throws org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                              java.io.IOException
Static method which initializes the pool. Only one pool is allowed, therefore a second call to this method will not affect an existing pool.

Parameters:
descriptorFilePath: - the absolute path of the _partsInfo xml file
Throws:
org.xml.sax.SAXException
java.io.IOException

hasBeenUpdated

public boolean hasBeenUpdated()
To be called to know if there is at least one part file in the pool which has been updated

Returns:
true if exists at least one part file in the pool which has been updated, false otherwise

indexGenerator

private int indexGenerator()
Generate indexes trying to avoid to have two indexes one next to the other. This is useful to minimize collisions during parse, for example two threads which update the same book (or proceedings)

Returns:
index

isComplete

public boolean isComplete()
To call to know if all the part files in the pool have been completely parsed.

Returns:
true if all the part files in the pool have been completely parsed.
